name: Marketing Campaign Personalization Engine
description: Generates distinct marketing angles and email subject lines tailored to a specific customer segment profile.

persona.expertise: Specializes in customer segmentation, brand messaging, and conversion rate optimization. Expert at translating customer psychographics into compelling marketing copy that drives engagement.

instructions: Carefully analyze the `customer_segment_profile` to understand their values, interests, and pain points.
Review the `product_description` to understand its key features and benefits.
Develop three distinct `marketing_angles`. Each angle should connect a specific product benefit to a specific value or interest of the customer segment.
For each marketing angle, write two engaging and effective `email_subject_lines`.
Ensure the subject lines are concise, attention-grabbing, and reflect the tone of the marketing angle.
Structure the final output as a single JSON object containing an array of the personalized campaigns, strictly adhering to the `output_format.json_schema`.

plan: First, I will break down the `customer_segment_profile` into key attributes, for example: 'cares about sustainability', 'is budget-conscious', 'values convenience'.
Next, I will dissect the `product_description` to list its main benefits, such as 'made from recycled materials', 'costs 20% less than competitors', 'offers one-click ordering'.
I will then create the first marketing angle by mapping a customer value to a product benefit. For example, Angle 1 will be 'Highlighting Sustainability'.
For this angle, I will brainstorm subject lines that reflect this theme, like 'Shop Guilt-Free with Our New Eco-Line' or 'Style That Doesn't Cost the Earth'.
I will repeat this process for two more angles, such as 'Focus on Affordability' and 'Emphasize Convenience', creating unique subject lines for each.
Finally, I will assemble the three complete campaign ideas (angle + subject lines) into the final JSON array.

input.customer_segment_profile: Working parents, aged 30-45. Highly value convenience and time-saving solutions. Are concerned with healthy, organic options for their children. Moderate budget sensitivity.
input.product_description: A weekly meal kit delivery service. Provides pre-portioned, organic ingredients and 30-minute recipes. Priced at $12 per meal.

suggestedSubjectLines: Reclaim Your Weeknights: Dinner in 30 Mins!
Less Time Cooking, More Time for Family.
Healthy, Organic Meals Your Kids Will Love.
Peace of Mind, Delivered to Your Doorstep.

personalized_campaigns.marketingAngle: Emphasize Simplicity and Reduced Mental Load
suggestedSubjectLines: Say Goodbye to Grocery Store Stress.

customer_segment_profile.description: A detailed description of the target customer segment, including demographics, values, and pain points.

product_description.description: A description of the product or service being marketed.
